trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint"></xref> event.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> event occurs after a row is painted on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> allows you to manually adjust the appearance of the row after the cells in the row are painted.
This is useful if you want to customize the row.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that owns the row that is being painted.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be painted.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that contains the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> that is being painted.
The row index of the cell that is being painted.
A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the row.
An error message that is associated with the row.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains formatting and style information about the row.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate whether the current row is the first row currently displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate whether the current row is the last row in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that has the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
dataGridView is .
-or- graphics is .
-or- inheritedRowStyle is .
Gets or sets the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
The ClipBounds property represents the area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> that needs to be repainted.

For example, if a user covers the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> with another window and then uncovers it, then ClipBounds represents the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
If a user covers a small area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> and then uncovers it, then ClipBounds represents the small area that was covered.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
Draws the focus rectangle around the specified bounds.
Use the DrawFocus method when you draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> and its cells' contents yourself.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the focus area.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor*> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine the color of the focus rectangle; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor*> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.

<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control minus one.
Gets a string that represents an error message for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
The value of the ErrorText property is the same as the current row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
A string that represents an error message for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class provides properties and methods that are useful for custom drawing.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
Gets the cell style applied to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
The InheritedRowStyle property contains the same values as the current row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
Directly accessing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> can affect performance.
Use InheritedRowStyle in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> event to avoid unsharing the row and maintain optimal performance.
The InheritedRowStyle property is read-only.
Although you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> retrieved through the InheritedRowStyle property, the new settings will have no effect.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains the cell style applied to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the current row is the first row displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row being painted is currently the first row displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the current row is the last visible row displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current row is the last row in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that has the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Paints the specified cell parts for the area in the specified bounds.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> to be painted.
A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values specifying the parts to paint.

<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control minus one.
Paints the cell backgrounds for the area in the specified bounds.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> to be painted.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to paint the background of the specified bounds with the color of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor*> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to paint the background of the specified bounds with the color of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor*> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control minus one.
Paints the cell contents for the area in the specified bounds.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> to be painted.

<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control minus one.
Paints the entire row header of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to paint the row header with the color of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor*> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to paint the row header with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor*> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.

<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control minus one.
Paints the specified parts of the row header of the current row.
A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values specifying the parts to paint.

<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control minus one.
Get the bounds of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
The width of the RowBounds property is the same as the width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
To get the width of the columns in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnsWidth%2A> method.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
Gets the index of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
The row index can be used to access the current row within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>.
The index of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
Gets the state of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
This property can be used to determine whether the row is frozen, read-only, or selected, among other states.
A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the row.
